entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hey there! Welcome to The Blog!

One of my goals for this coming year is to create more content. What this translates to is hopefully more content here! In the future, you can expect to see content covering tech, programming, keeb builds, photography, fitness, sneakers, paintball, design, etc. This is is going to be my place to dump all of that.

Hope to see you around! - AV
